======================
Installation
======================

---------------------
Windows
---------------------
.. image:: ./images/windows.png
Latest release `Tellurium-*.exe`: https://github.com/sys-bio/tellurium/releases

---------------------
Mac
---------------------
.. image:: ./images/macos.png
Latest release `Tellurium-*.dmg`: https://github.com/sys-bio/tellurium/releases

---------------------
Linux
---------------------
.. image:: ./images/linux.png

The dependencies and libraries have to be installed separately.
